text: Clive Howard Victor Staley (14 May 1899 – 18 March 1985) was an English professional footballer who played as a forward for Sunderland. ==References== Category:1899 births Category:1985 deaths Category:People from Newhall, Derbyshire Category:English footballers Category:Association football forwards Category:Newhall Swifts F.C. players Category:Sunderland A.F.C. players Category:Stoke City F.C. players Category:Burton Town F.C. players Category:English Football League players
title: Victor Staley
